name: Cactus Adventure
description:
Accompany Pedro the lost cactus  to the reserve. Pedro has to make his journey under the cover of darkness while monsters are hunting him. Don’t worry because with his special ability Pedro is able to create daylight out of darkness. Be aware as his ability doesn't last forever. If you use it frequently to eliminate your enemies, you will consume more energy. Fortunately, the track hides such energy that helps Pedro to recharge.

Guide him along the way to his friends and take down the monsters! Heal yourself in the daylight phase.

Controls
- TAB: change between day and night (on the top you can see your health and energy level, use your ability wisely)
- A,D: move right-left
- SPACE: jump (double jump)
- E: cactus strike, pick up energy
